4 mins to download

there's some skips in each song and for some odd reason the microsoft office sound for an event reminder near the end of "mutual core", but otherwise the sound it good. a great way to preview the fantastic album before it's released in higher quality.

flac lossless please?
Now that we know this is not the final master & Bjork is continuing to work on the record after this version, we need this in the best quality.
given the differences in "crystalline" and "cosmogony", i would guess this is the final re-worked version of the record. no way to know until it's out, i guess.

trfkad - Thank you!

It's a 10/10 to my ears and there's no odd sound on "Mutual Core" as erialleh mentioned in his/her comment.
anyone else try to make a cd / sync this to a phone and it won't do it due to "unknown length"? oh well. looking elsewhere.
It just took me 3 min to download....great album...Thanks everyone!!!
Thanks for the up. I can't believe this has been out since last month.

Thanks a lot. I Just bought this album yesterday but for some reason it won't allow me to rip it to my pc. So i appreciate it man.
